vclaim: In May 2019, the city of Statesville, N.C., filed for a court injunction to force Camping World to remove an American flag from their local branch.
title: Did Statesville, NC, Try to Stop Camping World from Flying the U.S. Flag?
subtitle: The company's CEO Marcus Lemonis told Snopes.com, "We will not be taking the flag down under any circumstances ... Never going to happen."
author: Dan MacGuill
